00028 #ifndef __ShadowCaster_H__
00029 #define __ShadowCaster_H__

00032 #include "OgreRenderable.h"

00035 namespace Ogre {
00036 
00037 
00052     class _OgreExport ShadowRenderable : public Renderable, public ShadowDataAlloc
00053     {
00054     protected:
00055         MaterialPtr mMaterial;
00056         RenderOperation mRenderOp;
00057         ShadowRenderable* mLightCap; // used only if isLightCapSeparate == true
00058     public:
00059         ShadowRenderable() : mMaterial(), mLightCap(0) {}
00060         virtual ~ShadowRenderable() { delete mLightCap; }
00064         void setMaterial(const MaterialPtr& mat) { mMaterial = mat; }
00066         const MaterialPtr& getMaterial(void) const { return mMaterial; }
00068         void getRenderOperation(RenderOperation& op) { op = mRenderOp; }
00070         RenderOperation* getRenderOperationForUpdate(void) {return &mRenderOp;}
00072         void getWorldTransforms(Matrix4* xform) const = 0;
00074         Real getSquaredViewDepth(const Camera*) const{ return 0; /* not used */}
00076         const LightList& getLights(void) const;
00087         bool isLightCapSeparate(void) const { return mLightCap != 0; }
00088 
00090         ShadowRenderable* getLightCapRenderable(void) { return mLightCap; }
00092         virtual bool isVisible(void) const { return true; }
00093 
00094     };
00095 
00097     enum ShadowRenderableFlags
00098     {
00100         SRF_INCLUDE_LIGHT_CAP = 0x00000001,
00102         SRF_INCLUDE_DARK_CAP  = 0x00000002,
00104         SRF_EXTRUDE_TO_INFINITY  = 0x00000004
00105     };
00106 
00109     class _OgreExport ShadowCaster
00110     {
00111     public:
00112         virtual ~ShadowCaster() { }
00114         virtual bool getCastShadows(void) const = 0;
00115 
00117         virtual EdgeData* getEdgeList(void) = 0;
00119         virtual bool hasEdgeList(void) = 0;
00120 
00122         virtual const AxisAlignedBox& getWorldBoundingBox(bool derive = false) const = 0;
00124         virtual const AxisAlignedBox& getLightCapBounds(void) const = 0;
00126         virtual const AxisAlignedBox& getDarkCapBounds(const Light& light, Real dirLightExtrusionDist) const = 0;
00127 
00128         typedef vector<ShadowRenderable*>::type ShadowRenderableList;
00129         typedef VectorIterator<ShadowRenderableList> ShadowRenderableListIterator;
00130 
00146         virtual ShadowRenderableListIterator getShadowVolumeRenderableIterator(
00147             ShadowTechnique shadowTechnique, const Light* light, 
00148             HardwareIndexBufferSharedPtr* indexBuffer, 
00149             bool extrudeVertices, Real extrusionDistance, unsigned long flags = 0 ) = 0;
00150 
00170         static void extrudeVertices(const HardwareVertexBufferSharedPtr& vertexBuffer, 
00171             size_t originalVertexCount, const Vector4& lightPos, Real extrudeDist);
00173         virtual Real getPointExtrusionDistance(const Light* l) const = 0;
00174     protected:
00176         Real getExtrusionDistance(const Vector3& objectPos, const Light* light) const;
00184         virtual void updateEdgeListLightFacing(EdgeData* edgeData, 
00185             const Vector4& lightPos);
00186 
00200         virtual void generateShadowVolume(EdgeData* edgeData, 
00201             const HardwareIndexBufferSharedPtr& indexBuffer, const Light* light,
00202             ShadowRenderableList& shadowRenderables, unsigned long flags);
00209         virtual void extrudeBounds(AxisAlignedBox& box, const Vector4& lightPos, 
00210             Real extrudeDist) const;
00211 
00212 
00213     };
